revised_title: The Evolution and Impact of Industrial Research Laboratories
tldr: The author discusses the evolution and importance of industrial research laboratories, using the Bell Telephone Laboratories as an example. These laboratories integrate research, development, design, and engineering to create new products and facilities. The author highlights the unique organizational structure of the Bell System, which is responsible for its own technology and manufacturing, and its impact on the advancement of telecommunications.
